timeline.author: geoand

timeline.message: feat: add doc about defaults Spring Boot naming strategies and log about how to configure the Quarkus properties to use them
feat: add doc about defaults Spring Boot naming strategies and log about how to configure the Quarkus properties to use them

timeline.bodyText: Hm... Did we update the Spring Boot version? If so, why? If not, why did we bump the Spring Boot version here?
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: Yes, I updated the spring boot version, I thought it would be ok but as talked before let's keep the 2.1.13
replies.author: aureamunoz

timeline.bodyText:
We need a Final version here, not an Alpha. This will be backported to 1.3.1.Final.
If 2.2.Final is not an option, use 2.2.SP1 or something like that.
/cc @geoand for verification.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
We agreed that the bump to 2.2 was not correct and we need to go back to 2.1.xxx
In any case @aureamunoz do keep in mind that in Quarkus master we can no longer have Alpha versions at any time.
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: Ok, yes. Thanks. I will do the necessary in the API and open a PR, then update this one
replies.author: aureamunoz
